atbat.des: Jason Bartlett singles on a ground ball to left fielder Brett Gardner.
atbat.des_es: Jason Bartlett pega sencillo con rodado a jardinero izquierdo Brett Gardner.

pitch.cc: Ivan Nova is trying to tie up Jason Bartlett with fastballs inside; Bartlett is hitting .313 on pitches in that location compared to .245 overall.

atbat.des: John Jaso walks. Jason Bartlett to 2nd.
atbat.des_es: John Jaso recibe base por bolas. Jason Bartlett a 2da.

atbat.des: Ben Zobrist singles on a line drive to right fielder Nick Swisher. Jason Bartlett to 3rd. John Jaso to 2nd.
atbat.des_es: Ben Zobrist pega sencillo con línea a jardinero derecho Nick Swisher. Jason Bartlett a 3ra. John Jaso a 2da.

atbat.des: Carl Crawford reaches on catcher interference by Francisco Cervelli. Jason Bartlett scores. John Jaso to 3rd. Ben Zobrist to 2nd. Carl Crawford to 1st.
atbat.des_es: Carl Crawford se embase por interferencia del receptor de Francisco Cervelli. Jason Bartlett anota John Jaso a 3ra. Ben Zobrist a 2da. Carl Crawford a 1ra.

atbat.des: Evan Longoria grounds into a double play, third baseman Alex Rodriguez to second baseman Robinson Cano to first baseman Mark Teixeira. John Jaso scores. Ben Zobrist to 3rd. Carl Crawford out at 2nd.
atbat.des_es: Evan Longoria batea rodado batea para doble matanza, tercera base Alex Rodriguez a segunda base Robinson Cano a primera base Mark Teixeira. John Jaso anota Ben Zobrist a 3ra. Carl Crawford a cabo a 2da.

action.des: Pitching Change: Boone Logan replaces Ivan Nova.

atbat.des: Dan Johnson singles on a soft fly ball to center fielder Curtis Granderson. Ben Zobrist scores.
atbat.des_es: Dan Johnson pega sencillo con elevado suave a jardinero central Curtis Granderson. Ben Zobrist anota.

atbat.des: Matt Joyce walks. Dan Johnson to 2nd.
atbat.des_es: Matt Joyce recibe base por bolas. Dan Johnson a 2da.

atbat.des: Carlos Pena singles on a soft ground ball to first baseman Mark Teixeira. Dan Johnson to 3rd. Matt Joyce to 2nd.
atbat.des_es: Carlos Pena pega sencillo con rodado suave a primera base Mark Teixeira. Dan Johnson a 3ra. Matt Joyce a 2da.

action.des: Pitching Change: Chad Gaudin replaces Boone Logan.

atbat.des: B. J. Upton walks. Dan Johnson scores. Matt Joyce to 3rd. Carlos Pena to 2nd.
atbat.des_es: B. J. Upton recibe base por bolas. Dan Johnson anota Matt Joyce a 3ra. Carlos Pena a 2da.

atbat.des: Jason Bartlett flies out to left fielder Brett Gardner.
atbat.des_es: Jason Bartlett batea elevado de out a jardinero izquierdo Brett Gardner.

atbat.des: Brett Gardner singles on a soft ground ball to shortstop Jason Bartlett.
atbat.des_es: Brett Gardner pega sencillo con rodado suave a campo corto Jason Bartlett.

atbat.des: Francisco Cervelli singles on a ground ball to left fielder Carl Crawford. Brett Gardner to 3rd.
atbat.des_es: Francisco Cervelli pega sencillo con rodado a jardinero izquierdo Carl Crawford. Brett Gardner a 3ra.

pitch.cc: Matt Garza has thrown 87 pitches but has plenty left in the tank, with his fastball sitting at 92 over the past 10 pitches.

atbat.des: Derek Jeter singles on a soft ground ball to center fielder B. Upton. Brett Gardner scores. Francisco Cervelli to 3rd. Derek Jeter to 2nd on the throw.
atbat.des_es: Derek Jeter pega sencillo con rodado suave a jardinero central B. Upton. Brett Gardner anota Francisco Cervelli a 3ra. Derek Jeter a 2da con el tiro.

action.des: Pitching Change: Grant Balfour replaces Matt Garza.

atbat.des: Curtis Granderson homers (21) on a fly ball to right field. Francisco Cervelli scores. Derek Jeter scores.
atbat.des_es: Curtis Granderson batea jonrón (21) con elevado por el jardín derecho. Francisco Cervelli anota Derek Jeter anota.

atbat.des: Mark Teixeira flies out to center fielder B. J. Upton.
atbat.des_es: Mark Teixeira batea elevado de out a jardinero central B. J. Upton.

atbat.des: Alex Rodriguez called out on strikes.
atbat.des_es: Alex Rodriguez se poncha sin tirarle.
